}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "NFA222", "250-02471-020", "E85792" and "1432-01" (08/2014) :is silkscreened on the front of the module in the photos. *[[Lite-On WCBN802A]]-AD M.2 ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2371257 FCC] OUI: B8:EE:65)
==See also== *[[Foxconn T77H348.20]] REV.0 GP/HF, P/N: 2204003543-03L2 *[[Foxconn T77H348.02]] ([[Atheros]] AR9462) : Mini PCIe (half-size) card reference design WB222 *[[AzureWave AW-NB182NF]] M.2 1630
